content.rendered:
Getting ready for a Zipline Tour!?! Here's a look at what you'll be experiencing when you zipline Colorado:

Practice your Colorado ziplining skills on our practice zipline!
 

Embark on your Colorado zip line tour with a short hike towards your first zip.

Take one zip at a time, including taking off on some jagged rocks!

The guides will follow you through the whole course, usually showing off their ziplining skills.

Have fun flying through the air and taking in the scenery.

Enjoy yourself as you use our self-braking system to slow yourself down…or not to!

In Idaho Springs, end your journey over Chicago Creek!

Want more information? Visit our Colorado Mountain Top Zipline site and check out both of our amazing courses.
